name: The Flamingo Files
description:
Find yourself working for a mysterious Microbiology Department, analysing unstable cells samples.

Observe and check your samples to detect unstable cells. Fill out accordingly the forms and validate them. They are precious regarding the activities of the Microbiology Department you're working for.

A game made for Ludum Dare 49 by Robin Bonenfant (aka Sherwood) and Little Hat.
